p: 4. In material and method: “… 2-year-old plants of S. baicalensis were sprayed with aqueous Na2S2O4 aqueous solutions at concentrations of 40 μmol/L, 0.4 μmol/L, and 0.004 μmol/L, and the control group was kept moist with just water. The samples were collected 0, 1, 2, and 3 days after spraying”. However, the result was not mentioned about the difference of result among those treatments.
